Creating 21st Century Science Infrastructure – are we doing enough?
To coincide with this year’s Autumn Statement and the publication of the Government’s science capital roadmap, AECOM and life science organisation One Nucleus are chairing an open discussion to review the roadmap – and to ask whether the UK is investing enough in science to retain its place as a world-class destination for scientific research.
Programme:
5.30pm Registration and refreshments 6.00pm Panel discussion 7.00pm-8.00pm Drinks and canapés
Confirmed Speakers:
Dr Kieron Flanagan, Senior Lecturer in Science and Technology Policy at Manchester Business School and a member of the Manchester Institute of Innovation Research David Parfrey, Executive Director, Finance & Campus Operations, BBSRC Dr Martino Picardo, CEO, Stevenage BioScience Catalyst
Introduction by Mark Halstead, Head of Science + Innovation, AECOM
Further speakers to be announced.
Read more about our See Further series
On: 11 December 2014 5.30pm-8.00pm
At: AECOM MidCity Place 71 High Holborn London WC1V 6QS
